formTemplates.title: Staff Application
formTemplates.description: Thank you for your interest in becoming a volunteer moderator. Please complete the form with honesty and showcase your personality.

fields.label: Your email
fields.helpText: Please monitor this as replies will be sent here.

fields.label: Introduce yourself.
fields.helpText: Who are you? Tell us about your hobbies, education, environment, schedule, and world view

fields.label: Introduce the server.
fields.helpText: From your point of view, what is the server about and why do you enjoy it?

fields.label: Describe in detail something you are passionate about.
fields.helpText: This could be anything, we want to hear it!

fields.label: Anything else?
fields.helpText: Use this space to reflect/explain on any punishments on the server or disclose other information relevant to your application.

fields.label: I am 16 years of age or older
I have a working microphone and am able to use recording software
I am willing to participate in a voice-call interview if this application is selected
I understand that it may take several weeks to process this application and I will not open additional tickets regarding the status of my application
